articles.content:
Congratulatory message to NCP 
    Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the Norwegian Communist Party (NCP) on June 14.
 The message extended warm congratulations and comradely greetings to the NCP Central Committee and all the party members on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the party.    
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would develop on good terms in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, it sincerely wished them greater success in their work to strengthen the party.

Kim Yong Nam greets Queen of UK
    Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Elizabeth II, Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, on June 15 on the occasion of her official birthday.
 The message wished the queen good health and happiness and expressed belief that the bilateral ties would grow stronger in different fields in the future.

Congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from diplomatic corps
    Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The message was handed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Palestinian Ambassador Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is doyen of the diplomatic corps.
